name: GalacticDoom
description:
In Galactic-doom you are a rebel pilot of an intergalactic organization, that developed a special military technology capable of collecting debris from other spaceships, this tech is able to adapt and mount those debris to your own spaceship, creating weapons and equipment to help you in your task to escape the Organization.

Team Name (if any) + Full Members Name / Nome da Equipe + Nomes completos

Team Name: Rest in Pixels 

Members: Ricardo Londero Machado

Luiz Augusto Pardo da Silva 

Rafael Dornelles Vicente  

Felipe Shiroma Rondina
